function getCoreaudiodPid() { local pid="$(ps aux | grep /usr/sbin/coreaudiod | head -1 | awk '{print $2}')" echo $pid }
pid="$(getCoreaudiodPid)" while true do #get the cpu usage of coreaudiod usage=$(ps -p $pid -o %cpu | tail -1)
#check if is higher than 0 isActive="$(echo $usage'>'0 | bc)" if [ $isActive -eq 0 ] then #keep coreudiod active without procuding a sound say ' ' fi
sleep 1.5 done
